com.ericsson.cino.assuredplus.singtel.voice

Interface IMemberLocation


  • public interface IMemberLocation
    Blueprint for querying location information pertinent to Assured+ solution and usecases.

    Assured-Plus will expose this interface as a functional service and Singtel will consume the same thru their voice channel application (potentially Amazon Alexa Skill)

    Author:
    esatnar

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LocationResponse definePlace(java.lang.String apUserId, java.lang.String place)
      Invoked on behalf of an AssuredPlus user, the method will query the definition of the place to be read out to the user.
      GeoFenceLocationResponse isMemberAt(java.lang.String apUserId, java.lang.String memberName, java.lang.String place)
      Invoked on behalf of an AssuredPlus user, the method will use any geofence info defined for places to respond.
      LocationResponse locateMember(java.lang.String apUserId, java.lang.String memberName)
      Invoked on behalf of an AssuredPlus user, the method will fetch the current (or last known) location of a member in the user's cricle(s).

    • Method Detail

      • locateMember

        LocationResponse locateMember(java.lang.String apUserId,
                              java.lang.String memberName)
                       throws ServiceException
        Invoked on behalf of an AssuredPlus user, the method will fetch the current (or last known) location of a member in the user's cricle(s).

        The response would attempt to present

        • the pnemonic alias (name defined by the user) to a place, if the member is (or in close proximity) to the place.
        • If the member is not located in any of the known places, then GPS coordinates shall be returned
        • Optionally, in all cases, there would be an attempt to geo-decode the GPS coordinates to a human friendly text address. Googe Geocoding API can be recommended. If this optional element is missing in response, the invoker can geo-decode the GPS through any GIS services to resolve the textual address at the client side.
        Parameters:
        apUserId - unique identity to the user in assured plus platform (mobile or email, based on their registration)
        memberName - name of the member/friend to be located
        Returns:
        member's location info with 3 possible forms described. Refer LocationResponse for structure.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - indicates and explains any faults/ errors as to why the request could not be processed functionally.
        See Also:
        LocationResponse} for response structure.

      • isMemberAt

        GeoFenceLocationResponse isMemberAt(java.lang.String apUserId,
                                    java.lang.String memberName,
                                    java.lang.String place)
                             throws ServiceException
        Invoked on behalf of an AssuredPlus user, the method will use any geofence info defined for places to respond.

        The implementation must be loosely aligned to the expected behaviour below:

        • If the assured plus user has defined any geofence (and time rules) that is linked to member in context...
        • If the member is expected to be in the place (based on geofence info)...
          • and the member is indeed in that geofence, then a positive acknowledgement & geofence info be set in response
          • and the member is not in the place, then a negative acknowledgement & geofence info be set in the response
        • If there are no places or valid geofences (time rules to that member does not apply), then a simple negative acknowledge in response
        Parameters:
        apUserId - unique identity to the user in assured plus platform (mobile or email, based on their registration)
        memberName - name of the member/friend to be located
        place - a pneumonic alias defined by the assured plus user in context.
        Returns:
        member's location info with geofence info
        Throws:
        ServiceException - indicates and explains any faults/ errors as to why the request could not be processed functionally.
        See Also:
        for response structure

      • definePlace

        LocationResponse definePlace(java.lang.String apUserId,
                             java.lang.String place)
                      throws ServiceException
        Invoked on behalf of an AssuredPlus user, the method will query the definition of the place to be read out to the user.
        Parameters:
        apUserId - unique identity to the user in assured plus platform (mobile or email, based on their registration)
        place - a pneumonic alias defined by the assured plus user in context.
        Returns:
        location info with 3 possible forms described in locateMember(String, String). Refer LocationResponse for structure.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - indicates and explains any faults/ errors as to why the request could not be processed functionally.
        See Also:
        LocationResponse} for response structure.
